title: South Loop 2 bed 2 bath Lofts - Central AC, Updated Kitchen, Amenities
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 205850512', 'Rent: $3,000 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Gas, Heat, Hot Water, Internet, Water', 'Parking:: attached garage', 'Be one of the first to live in these beautiful brand-new updated apartments at the KisselKar Lofts!', 'This 2 bed 2 bath unit features stainless steel appliances, central AC, laundry in unit, incredible finishes throughout and desirable floor plans.', 'Building includes a 1600 sq ft fitness facility including Echelon bikes, gorgeous rooftop overlooking downtown.', '**There is a $150.00 monthly bundled service fee for cooking gas and heat**', 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Bike Room/Bike Trails', 'Cats Ok', 'Central Air', 'Central Heat', 'Deck', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Dogs Negotiable', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Elevator', 'Exposed Brick', 'Free Laundry', 'Garage', 'Garage Parking Available', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Gut Rehab', 'Gym', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Loft', 'Modern', 'New Appliances', 'New Carpet', 'No Smoking', 'Private Balcony', 'Quartz Countertops', 'Renovated', 'Short Term Ok', 'Small Dog OK', 'Spacious Closets', 'Stainless Steel Fridge', 'Stove', 'Track Lighting', 'Updated Bathroom', 'Updated Kitchen', 'Ariel Pang', 'Real Estate Broker', 'The Apartment Source', 'Text or Call (847) 902 - 3419', 'The Apartment Source', 'Call or text:', '773.404.9900']
